name: UntitledCharts
subtitle: A source for the PJSK community.
description: Welcome to the UntitledCharts source! The place to download all our public projects.

apps.name: Retro Sekai!
apps.subtitle: Project Sekai but RETRO STYLE.
apps.localizedDescription:
RetroSekai, like most apps by UntitledCharts, is whitelisted! Join our Discord @ https://discord.gg/UntitledCharts. In order to play on this app, you MUST meet the requirements as stated on our Discord server (such as being somewhat active). Any apps listed in this repo will not have outrageous whitelist requirements.

Welcome to RetroSekai!

RetroSekai is a private server for the popular game Project Sekai (プロセカ, officially HATSUNE MIKU: COLORFUL STAGE) that brings back the game's 2.8.0 version. This version is the last version that has the game's "old UI", a nostalgic and cool UI that was modernized after version 3.0.0 (also known as the 3rd anniversary update).

For more information, join our Discord! You can ask questions or discuss RetroSekai with others.

Development credits: 0x1b1b

versions.localizedDescription: Welcome to RetroSekai. Listed on AltStore/SideStore.
